title: recipes_Maple_Syrup_Tarts
text:
Title: Maple Syrup Tarts.
.
Description: Walnuts, maple syrup, brown sugar, an egg, and a smidgen of lemon juice and butter are stirred together and spooned into twelve prepared tart shells. Bake and serve topped with dollops of whipped cream..
.
Ingredients:.
- 12 (3 inch) unbaked tart shells.
- 1 egg.
- 1 cup real maple syrup.
- 1 tablespoon butter, melted.
- 0.25 cup packed brown sugar.
- 1 tablespoon lemon juice.
- 0.5 cup chopped walnuts.
.
Instructions:.
- Preheat oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C)..
- Beat the egg gently with a fork, and then mix with maple syrup, melted butter, brown sugar, lemon juice, and nuts. Fill tarts 2/3 full..
- Bake for 20 to 25 minutes..
.
Nutrients:.
calories: 270 kcal.
carbohydrateContent: 42 g.
cholesterolContent: 18 mg.
fiberContent: 0 g.
proteinContent: 3 g.
saturatedFatContent: 3 g.
sodiumContent: 107 mg.
sugarContent: 25 g.
fatContent: 11 g.
unsaturatedFatContent: 0 g.
.
Serves: 12 servings.
